description: Everywhere Michael goes, he seems to find gorgeous, sexy men . . . particularly when he wanders past a window and sees Czech studs Tadeusz, Roki and Marten going at it hot and heavy. The men catch on to their naughty peeping tom and close the shades in his face before going on to slurp each others cocks and pound each others asses. Yum!
title: Marten, Roki, and Tadeusz
